Package BoardElements.Monsters

Class CleverMonster

java.lang.Object
BoardElements.BoardElement.BoardElement
BoardElements.Monsters.Monster
BoardElements.Monsters.CleverMonster
All Implemented Interfaces:
IsOn2DimensionalBoard, isPaintable, SelfMovable
public class CleverMonster extends Monster
This class represents a monster that is clever and can find the player even if it is hiding.
